prompt: Re-write this music caption in three different styles. You can mix the order of the instruments.
inputs: This song includes Guitar, Pipe, Bass, Piano, but without Drums.
captions:
Style 1:
This piece of music features Piano, Guitar, Pipe, and Bass, but no Drums.

Style 2:
This song is composed of Guitar, Pipe, Bass, and Piano, but without Drums.

Style 3:
This composition is made up of Bass, Guitar, Pipe, and Piano, but no Drums.
